text: “I got bullied terribly on social media," she told host Tom Bergeron, People reports . "I did an interview. It was taken out of context completely and there were images. People were calling me the N word. It was really ugly. It was every time I went online it’s, ‘Oh, how much we hate you. How talentless you are.’ They actually made images of me being whipped, beaten, hung.”
title: Fifth Harmony's Normani Kordei Says Cyberbullies Sent Her Violent Images

meta_data.title: Normani Kordei Racist Bullying, Dancing With The Stars
meta_data.description: The Fifth Harmony singer got emotional during last night's "Dancing with the Stars" as she recalled receiving images depicting her being beaten.
